message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60%, you get 40%. What do you say?
Your offer was a bit too one-sided, Alice. How about we try a more balanced approach this time?
Let's compromise. I'll take 55% and you get 45%. It's closer to your offer but still fair. What do you say?
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. A 50/50 split is the fairest and simplest solution.  Let's wrap this up.
